page.title: 10Local Traditions
page.content: There are several traditional events which take place in the area. Â£Walking Day' takes place on the nearest Sunday to the 21st June. All the children from the Church of England Schools together with groups associated with the church parade through the village. It is traditional for the children to be dressed in Sunday best or in the uniform of their organisation. After the walk there is a fair on the church field which they all attend. Another similar walking day takes place in Bickerstaffe Village. This is followed by maypole dancing. An annual event also associated with the church is a Strawberry Cream Tea held in the Vicar's garden. The schools hold Gala days where there are stalls selling craft work and lots of fun and games.
